Comment: Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker used an appearance on *Jimmy Kimmel Live!* to come up with nicknames before Trump could think up another weight-based putdown.   The president, [whose feud with the ultra-wealthy Pritzker family runs deep](https://www.thedailybeast.com/trumps-bitter-personal-feud-with-pritzker-family-is-behind-his-harvard-hate-campaign/), has previously poked fun at his foe’s appearance.  “I have two nicknames I could think of. One is, of course, JBurger… because he did talk about me eating burgers,” Pritzker said. “Or this is my favorite, JBeefy.”  [**Read the full story**](https://www.thedailybeast.com/jblt-pritzker-and-jimmy-kimmel-spitball-fat-jibes-trump-could-use-against-him/).
Author: thedailybeast

Comment: The media should've been doing this years ago. Instead, they've normalized the idea that Trump gets special treatment: he can crudely make fun of the weight or appearance of others, even as an obese man himself, but no one is allowed to turn it around on him. Even children typically understand that turnabout is perfectly fair play.  What suckers we all are.
Author: Logical_Hare
